pr_title: Fix ClimberPathNavigator spinning when width is small. Closes #6993

timeline.message: Fix ClimberPathNavigator spinning when width is small

timeline.bodyText:
A proper fix would be nicer then just enforing a min value of 1.0, but I guess that would be a too complicated patch?
Also, please add a comment saying FORGE: Fix MC-94054 Entities using ClimberPathNavigator spinning in navigation when width is small or something like that.
timeline.author: ichttt

replies.bodyText: Enforcing the min value didn't really change anything in the pathfinding other than fix the spinning from what I could see. But yes I also think fixing it the proper way would be more complicated.
